attributes.action: publish a monthly summary of petition status and reponse.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every day many new petitions are submitted.  The associated processes of acceptance/rejection/response are opaque. [If not, please let me know where they are set out; given a satisfactory answer I will withdraw this petition.]  If the present Prime Minister is at all serious about having a petition system, he should make this clear by publishing this information.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk. Please also see http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
